question:
Your English-speaking friend who lives in your town has asked for your advice about learning a new sport. Write an email to your friend. In your email
Recommend a new sport that would be suitable for your friend to learn
Explain how your firend could learn this sport
Suggest that you both learn this sport together
text: Hope this finds you well. It has come to my attention that you are seeking some advice about a sport that you can learn.

I recommend you  learn about windsurfing. Personally, I believe it would be an easy thing for you to learn, because we have the lagoon here, and on top of that, we have enough wind to do windsurfing. Even if you go home, I know you can find plenty of places to do this sport.

If you are interested in doing this, I can recommend some places where you can get your hands on this sport. One of the places would be, the Bentota Beach Hotel, they have a good water sports academy. Tutors are very well trained, and the course fee is also reasonable.
Let me know if you are going to join  the classes, I can join as well. I had kept my interest low in learning this sport because could not find a nice companion .
I will stop here, if you need more information please feel free to call me on my mobile.
